column4: xchat is a better irc client.. Pidgin is a good chat client.. the two don't always mix.. I'd switch. you might be happier in the future.
what do you mean as portable.. on a usb stick?
yes
maybe.. never tried.. there is a windows version and a linux version.. not sure if there is a unified version.
- Yeah thats fine but I just want a version I can use on three different computers and keep all my settings synced
check this out  http://portableapps.com/node/9398
use tab to complete nicks.. much easier.
Thanks
now you know why it's better to use xchat on irc :)
Yup sure do - Thanks for the push, I am glad they have a portable version, I will be sure and thank the developer(s)
nothing fully emulates IE.. not even IE5lin

that's because it requires directx and probably some custom asp programming.. I go to several sites like that and as a result need windows installed in a VM.  Makes me mad but not much to do about it.
remember win2k & pro don't need activation for installation in a vm
All they have is an upgrade disk and the OS boot drive just failed big time (loud noises), can't even buy Pro anymore can you?
I did not know pro and 2000 didnt need activation in a VM though! Thank
